Nightlight:

Nightlight moved with repulsion when Saberback touched her and=
 then with horror when she realized that something horrible may happen at T=
ucson.

She struggled while she was pushed against her will wherever her ca=
ptors lead her


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Super Cyclonus <supercyclon=
us@...> wrote:
>
> > <OLD>
> >
> > Nightlight unwilling followed them, she =
tried to memorize all the
> > sorroundings hoping to be able to find her wa=
y if she had a chance
> 
> <NEW>
> 
> SABERBACK was ignoring NIGHTLIGHT for=
 the moment as the SHARKTICON
> guards had her firmly in their grasp. They =
had pushed her up to a lift
> and were about to enter it when SABERBACK got=
 a call on his radio.
> 
> "What is it?" He said imperiously.
> 
> He pause=
d while someone on the other end spoke to him.
> 
> "What?" he said incredu=
lously. "How?" He said into his radio.
> 
> Finally he nodded and looked at=
 NIGHTLIGHT, "I had so many sweet plans
> for you." He said as he ran a cla=
wed finger on her chin plate. His
> frown deepened. "But there has been a s=
light . . . delay in them.
> 
> SABERBACK's frown became a twisted and wick=
ed smile, "We will let you
> watch as we put a few Maximals to death first,=
 and then I can get back
> to my plans for you."
> 
> Glancing at the SHARK=
TICONS he turned to walk back down the hall away
> from the lift. "Bring he=
r!" SABERBACK barked as he walked.
> 
> The SHARKTICONS began to force NIGH=
TLIGHT down the hall away from the
> lift. This time the pace was much fast=
er.
> 
> (TAG)
> 
> - Preston
>
